    • About Mike Misak Chobanian


    Mike Chobanian & Vegas Capital Realty is a full service real estate and property management company, specializing in Selling, buying and property management. We provide expert advice that specializes in the local Las Vegas, Henderson Market. We offer excellent customer service while offering our clients the latest in cutting edge technology in order to gain maximum listing exposure to sell your house and buying the perfect home along with managing your rental property to maximize your profit.

    Let Mike Chobanian & Vegas Capital Realty help you buy, sell, invest or property management today!
